name: Cinema Jumper
description:
Cinema Jumper takes your through the minds of 3 famous Japanese cinema directors. Featuring 3 levels, the game tasks the player with navigating tricky obstacles that were inspired by the directing and cinematographic styles of Akira Kurosawa, Kenji Mizoguchi, and Yasujiro Ozu.

Worked with a partner to create the game. I was responsible for level design, mechanics implementing and tuning, and sound design.
